input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company 4.5' Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill PowerConnect Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 12-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green BH Fraser Fir Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 10-Ft. Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree with Multi-Color LED String Lighting'
  - Name='Dunhill Fir Slim Tree with Clear Lights The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='Northlight 18" Potted Downswept Mini Village Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree Unlit'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 7.5 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International Hillside Spruce 7.5' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Lights'
  - Name='Alcott Hill Tall Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 10 Ft. Flocked Snowy Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Potted Two Tone Apple Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 2' Potted Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 10' Flocked Slim Utica Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 4Ft Pre-Lit Sierra Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Hello Honey Handmade Recycled Paper Folding Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions Duxbury Slim Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 2' Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Wall or Door Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 24" Mixed Kateson Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 4.5' Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and product line (Dunhill Fir), similar tree type and likely similar construction, though slightly smaller height and presumably unlit or fewer lights based on name.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill PowerConnect Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Dunhill Fir model with PowerConnect feature likely indicating pre-lit with easy-to-connect lights, very closely matching all core features of the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar premium artificial fir tree with hinged (flip) branches for ease of assembly, full-bodied similar construction but different brand and specific fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green BH Fraser Fir Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Not a tree but a garland set; though same general product category (holiday greenery), very different form and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 10-Ft. Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree with Multi-Color LED String Lighting
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree with lighting, but different species (Foxtail Pine), larger size, multi-color LEDs vs. clear, likely different branch construction and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dunhill Fir Slim Tree with Clear Lights The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Dunhill Fir type and clear lights as reference, but slimmer profile which differs from the full-bodied design; very similar construction and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18" Potted Downswept Mini Village Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree Unlit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller, unlit pine tree designed for village or decorative use, not equivalent in size, construction, or lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 7.5 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar large artificial fir tree with traditional design and realistic construction, but different brand and fir variety; likely similar usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International Hillside Spruce 7.5' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree similar height, but spruce rather than fir with fewer lights; comparable in purpose and lighting but differs in silhouette and species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill Tall Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic tall artificial Christmas tree, no specific fir type or construction details; less specific resemblance to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 10 Ft. Flocked Snowy Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine tree with flocking (snow effect) and larger size; similar category but different species and appearance due to flocking.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6.5' Potted Two Tone Apple Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (apple tree), smaller and decorative potted type, no details on lighting; not very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 2' Potted Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Miniature pine tree, likely decorative rather than full tree replacement, no lighting mentioned; minimal relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 10' Flocked Slim Utica Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 10-foot tall artificial fir with flocking and slim profile; some similarity in type but size and profile differ and flocking adds different appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4Ft Pre-Lit Sierra Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit noble fir tree, smaller size but similar purpose and construction with hinged branches likely; different fir variety but similar features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hello Honey Handmade Recycled Paper Folding Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Completely different product type: handmade paper folding tree, no artificial foliage, no lighting, not comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. Norway Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, similar sized artificial fir tree but different specific fir species (Norway Fir), probably similar construction and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions Duxbury Slim Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand slim model Christmas tree; possibly similar construction but different shape and slimmer profile compared to full Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 2' Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Wall or Door Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small artificial fir product intended for wall or door, very different size and use compared to full artificial tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 24" Mixed Kateson Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small mixed fir species artificial tree, much smaller than reference and likely decorative rather than full size.
